TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AsyncStateMachineAttribute extends System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StateMachineAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AsyncStateMachineAttribute Inherits StateMachineAttribute
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AsyncStateMachineAttribute extends System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StateMachineAttribute

summary.span: 指示是否使用 Async 或 [async](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async) 修饰符标记方法。

span.span: Indicates whether a method is marked with either the Async or [async](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async) modifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应将属性应用于 `AsyncStateMachine` 代码中的方法。You shouldn't apply the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute to methods in your code. 对于具有 async 修饰符的方法，编译器将 `AsyncStateMachine` 在编译器发出的 IL 中应用特性。For methods that have the async modifier, the compiler will apply the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute in the IL that the compiler emits. 如果 (方法 *名称* 的方法) 具有 Async 或 async 修饰符，则编译器将发出包含状态机结构的 IL。When a method (*MethodName*) has the Async or async modifier, the compiler emits IL that includes a state machine structure. 此结构包含方法中的代码。This structure contains the code in the method. 该 IL 还包含一个存根方法， (方法 *名称*) 调用到状态机。That IL also contains a stub method (*MethodName*) that calls into the state machine. 编译器 `AsyncStateMachine` 会将属性添加到存根方法，以便工具能够识别相应的状态机。The compiler adds the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute to the stub method so that tools can identify the corresponding state machine. 在未来版本的编译器中，发出的 IL 的详细信息可能会发生变化。Details of the emitted IL might change in future releases of the compilers. 有关异步功能的信息，请参阅 [异步编程 (c # ) ](/dotnet/csharp/async) 或异步编程 [和 Await (Visual Basic) ](/dotnet/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/)。For information about the Async feature, see [Asynchronous programming (C#)](/dotnet/csharp/async) or [Asynchronous programming with Async and Await (Visual Basic)](/dotnet/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/). ## Examples 如下面的示例所示，可以确定方法是否使用 [Async](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/async) 或 [async](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async) 修饰符进行标记。As the following example shows, you can determine whether a method is marked with [Async](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/async) or [async](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async) modifier. 在此示例中， `IsAsyncMethod` 执行以下步骤：In the example, `IsAsyncMethod` performs the following steps: - 使用获取 方法名称的对象 。Obtains a object for the method name by using . - 使用[GetType 运算符](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator)或[typeof](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/typeof)获取属性的对象。Obtains a object for the attribute by using [GetType Operator](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator) or [typeof](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/typeof). - 使用获取方法和属性类型的特性对象 `MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute` 。Obtains an attribute object for the method and attribute type by using `MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`. 如果 `GetCustomAttribute` `Nothing` Visual Basic) 或 `null` (c # ) 返回 (，则该方法不包含特性。If `GetCustomAttribute` returns `Nothing` (Visual Basic) or `null` (C#), the method doesn't contain the attribute. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/runtime.compilerservices.asyncstatemachineattribute/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/runtime.compilerservices.asyncstatemachineattribute/vb/module1.vb#1)]

param.name: stateMachineType
param.span: 用于实现状态机方法的基础状态机类型的类型对象。

span.span: The type object for the underlying state machine type that's used to implement a state machine method.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
